description.para: Generates makefile dependency information for C/C++ source code.

syntax.cmd_param: [-?] [ -f makefile ] [ -s source_dir ] [ -p output_prefix ] [ -x output_suffix ] [ -I include_dir ] [ -D name=def ] [ -D name ] [ -o ] [ -t ] [ -l listfile ] source_file ...

param.param_note: Specifies a generated file to put output of mkdepend
Specifies a directory for source file (directory used to compile file is different from source file directory)
Adds prefix to target file (when target file and source file are not located in the same directory)
Adds suffix for target file (suffix is .o or .obj, the default is .obj)
Setup search directory (setup directory in search directory list, the default search directory is specified by INCLUDE environment variable)
Defines macro (macro is used to put sign list defined by mkdepend, without =def, the sign value is one)
When reading file, treat each line as a source file file name
For file that could not be found, ignor the denpendency about it.For example, if could not find included file in specified directory, dependency is not generated
Use source file name replace extension name generated by -x and prefix name generated by -p
Deletes exclude_dir specified directory from recursive search directory
